data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Goleta, California, USA (ELL)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Goleta, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway Tidbit Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. TBIC32+4+27) beginning 1999-07-14. The instrument depth was 003 meters, in an overall water depth of 015 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
